title: LIDSEN Publishing Inc.The Open Access Publisher
description: LIDSEN series of journals are published by LIDSEN Publishing Inc, a non-profit scholarly Open Access publisher focused on biological, biomedical and medical studies. We aim to select ground-breaking research based on novelty, timeliness, scientific significance, potential audience interests, etc. We strive to provide an easily and freely accessible platform to researchers and practitioners in support of their novel and valuable ideas.
